mapper.select: select * from passenger_ticket_info where passenger_pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR} order by ticket_index
mapper.sql: team_number, client_number, first_ticket_date, first_start_city, first_end_city, ticket_order_pk, name, id, sale_product_pk, create_user, pk, update_user, create_time, update_time, status, order_number, comment, change_pk, cellphone_A, cellphone_B, chairman
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM passenger_ticket_info A LEFT JOIN air_ticket_name_list B ON A.passenger_pk = B.pk WHERE A.base_pk = #{payable_pk,jdbcType=CHAR} AND A.ticket_index = 1

select
from air_ticket_name_list where team_number in
#{item}
order by team_number

select A.team_number, A.client_number, A.first_ticket_date, A.first_start_city, A.first_end_city, A.ticket_order_pk, A.name, A.id, A.sale_product_pk, A.create_user, A.pk, A.update_user, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.status, A.order_number, A.comment, B.ticket_cost, A.change_pk from air_ticket_name_list A LEFT JOIN view_sum_ticket_cost B ON A.pk= B.passenger_pk where A.pk in
#{item}

pk,

status,
order_number,
comment,
cellphone_A,
cellphone_B,
chairman,

mapper.update:
update air_ticket_name_list
team_number = #{team_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_number = #{client_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_ticket_date = #{first_ticket_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_start_city = #{first_start_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_end_city = #{first_end_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ticket_order_pk = #{ticket_order_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_product_pk = #{sale_product_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_number = #{order_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_pk = #{change_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
cellphone_A = #{cellphone_A,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone_B = #{cellphone_B,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chairman = #{chairman,jdbcType=CHAR},
where pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select A.team_number, A.client_number, A.order_number, A.comment, B.user_name AS client_name, CONCAT(A.first_start_city,'--',A.first_end_city) AS first_from_to, A.first_ticket_date, A.first_start_city, A.first_end_city, A.ticket_order_pk, A.name, A.id, A.sale_product_pk, A.create_user, A.pk, A.update_user, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.status, C.name_confirm_status, D.ticket_cost, A.change_pk, C.days, E.comment AS need_comment
from air_ticket_name_list A LEFT JOIN user_base B ON A.client_number= B.user_number LEFT JOIN budget_order_view C ON A.team_number=C.team_number LEFT JOIN view_sum_ticket_cost D ON A.pk= D.passenger_pk LEFT JOIN air_ticket_order E ON A.ticket_order_pk = E.pk
and A.status in ('Y','C')
and B.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.client_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.team_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.team_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.order_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.order_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.first_ticket_date>=#{params.bo.date_from,jdbcType=CHAR}
and A.first_ticket_date<=#{params.bo.date_to,jdbcType=CHAR}
ORDER BY A.order_number,A.team_number,ticket_order_pk,A.first_ticket_date

select distinct ticket_order_pk from air_ticket_name_list where pk in
#{item}
